bibl.title: Egeria and Peter the Deacon on the Site of Clysma (Suez).
bibl.note: The focus of this paper is on Clysma and questions raised by evidence for the site that is contained in Egeria's Itinerarium and supplemented by Peter the Deacon's description.
bibl.seg: MAYERSON Philip, Egeria and Peter the Deacon on the Site of Clysma (Suez).
The focus of this paper is on Clysma and questions raised by evidence for the site that is contained in Egeria's Itinerarium and supplemented by Peter the Deacon's description.
